title: Pumpkin Cheesecake Bar Storage and Safety

items.name: Refrigerated shelf life
items.details: Pumpkin cheesecake bars (and similar dairy desserts) last about 5-7 days in the fridge when properly covered.

items.name: Room temperature warning
items.details: If they sat out at room temperature for more than 2 hours at any point, they are not safe to eat.

items.name: Signs of spoilage
items.details: Check for sour smell, slimy texture, or moisture pooling. If any of these are present, discard them.

items.name: Peak flavor
items.details: Pumpkin cheesecake bars actually get better after a few days as the spices meld together.

notes: General rule for dairy-based baked desserts: 5-7 days refrigerated, never more than 2 hours at room temperature.
